# AI tools comparison

**Date:** 2025-07-29

---

**User:** Please compile a comprehensive table listing the major AI tools (not drilling down to the individual agents) - e.g. ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude,

threads.title: 🔐 Privacy & Data Security: Risks by Tool & Tier
threads.excerpt: **User:** I'm concerned we're breezing over the privacy / data security considerations with this info, Fred... The NFP CEO is going to be far more concerned about this than an exec employed in the for

citeturn0news24turn0search19 | Useful for risk‑averse decision-making, drafting sensitive communication, policy summaries, strategy analysis with strong safety filters. **International Development**  
   – **Claude** for long-form strategy papers; **Gemini** to prepare multi-country summaries and email outreach. **Agriculture / Food Security**  
    – **Gemini** for campaign plans; **Claude** for grant proposals and board strategy memos
